module.name: MageSuite_SeoLinkMasking
module.description: The module allows masking/demasking filter URLs

entry.overview: Added additional configuration to enable filter options in the filter URL when masking is enabled.
Added support for short filters on the brand pages.
Revert changes from tag 1.3.2 and fix filter around url plugin

There will be notification in admin panel with warning that options in filterable, searchable frontend attributes need to be unique. In case when they are not, warning will be displayed if module is enabled in admin panel, option "Enable hiding of filter names in URL" is also enabled and option "Enable displaying warnings about duplicated options in attributes" is also enabled.
Added option to mask category urls on search result page
Fix helper declaration in template, added view model for configuration value fetch
